content: Phase 1: Discount system + Fizze Admin - 95% COMPLETE (only minor accessibility warnings)
Phase 2: Role-Based Access Control (Owner/Admin/Marketing/Sales) - Create roles.py, update auth.py, permission system
Phase 3: Social Media Integrations - Call integration playbooks, implement FB/IG/TikTok routes
Phase 4: SEO Optimization - Meta tags, structured data, sitemap, robots.txt, analytics
Phase 5: Final comprehensive testing + fix remaining bugs
Phase 6: Production Documentation - README, RUNBOOK, env vars documentation
